original_title: シリーズ「遺物」 未解決事件流出証拠検証記録 Vol.1「遺品」
overview: The first in a series of "Unsolved Case Outflow Evidence Verification Record" Relics "" that reveals the truth of unsolved cases. Evidence video group of unsolved cases that occurred in Japan announced in South Korea. Is the proof image that is so scary true or fake? Astonishing truth reveals the truth of the unsolved case ...
title: Unsolved Case Outflow Evidence Verification Record Vol.1
